# NSDatePickerCell

**Class**

An object that controls the behavior of a date picker, or of a single date picker cell in a matrix.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSDatePickerCell
```

## Configuring Appearance

- **backgroundColor**: The cell’s background color.
- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell draws its background.
- **textColor**: The cell’s text color.
- **datePickerStyle**: The date picker style to use.
- **datePickerElements**: A bitmask that indicates which visual elements are shown by the date picker.

## Range Mode

- **datePickerMode**: The mode in use by the date picker.

## Object Values

- **dateValue**: The date currently specified in the picker.
- **timeInterval**: The time interval that represents the date range.
- **calendar**: The calendar used by the date picker.
- **locale**: The locale used to display dates.
- **timeZone**: The time zone used to display time-related values.

## Date Range Constraints

- **minDate**: The minimum date that the picker allows as input.
- **maxDate**: The maximum date that the picker allows as input.

## Getting and Setting the Delegate

- **delegate**: The delegate associated with the date picker.

## Constants

- **NSDatePicker.Style**: Constants that define the visual appearance of the date picker cell.
- **NSDatePicker.Mode**: Constants that define whether the picker provides a single date, or a range of dates.
- **NSDatePicker.ElementFlags**: Constants that specify the date and time elements displayed by the picker.

## Initializers

- **init(coder:)**
- **init(textCell:)**

## Cells

- **NSDatePickerCellDelegate**: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDatePickerCell] objects.

## Inherits From

- NSActionCell

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSAccessibilityElementProtocol
- NSAccessibilityProtocol
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSUserInterfaceItemIdentification
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
